Subject: Re: [archive-crawler] Where can I find the surts-dump-file?
X-Yahoo-Group-Post: member; u=269199031

mjjjhjemj wrote:
> I am running a Deciding Scope crawl with the SurtPrefixedDecideRule. I
> see the option in Settings to define the location for the
> surts-source-file, but do not see anything to either setup the
> location of the surts-dump-file or determine its location if it
> defaults to one.
> I have searched under $HERITRIX_HOME and cannot seem to locate one if
> it defaults to creating one.

I think you may need to "view expert settings" to see it.
In the order.xml it is, e.g.:
<string name="surts-dump-file">/home/magin/testcrawl/surts.dump</string>

Specifying an absolute path puts it where you want.  If you just give a 
filename, it puts it under your disk-path.

Mike
